    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomService

        public RoomService()
        Constructor of RoomService() Create a new empty room service

      • RoomService

        public RoomService(MenuItem orderedMenu,
                   Room roomNumber,
                   java.time.LocalDate orderDate,
                   java.time.LocalTime orderTime,
                   java.lang.String remarks,
                   java.lang.String paid,
                   java.lang.String status)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor of RoomService() Create a new room with the given ordered menu,roomN number,order date,order time, remarks, payment status, and room service status)
        Parameters:
        orderedMenu - The menu ordered by guest of this room service
        roomNumber - The number of the room that ordered this room service
        orderDate - The order date of this room service
        orderTime - The order time of this room service
        remarks - The remarks this room service
        paid - The payment status of this room service , Payment status can be "PAID" or "UNPAID"
        status - The status of this room service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw input/output exception
